guidecard.title: CENSUS AND STATISTICS (LABOUR EARNINGS SURVEY) ORDER

rule.title: CENSUS AND STATISTICS (LABOUR EARNINGS SURVEY) ORDER

rul.title: Interpretation
rul.lp.txt: In this Order, unless the context otherwise requires—

legdef.lp.txt: ” (業務經營) means an undertaking carrying on business in Hong Kong, including profit-making bodies, non-profit-making bodies and statutory bodies;
” (調查) means the statistical survey referred to in section 3;
” (調查期) means the survey period specified under section 6.

rul.title: Survey of payroll and wages
rul.lp.txt: The Commissioner shall carry out a statistical survey on the expiration of each survey period in respect of business undertakings for the purpose of compiling statistics relating to payroll and wages in the survey period.

subrul.lp.txt: For the purpose of a survey, the Commissioner may require a person referred to in section 5 to give information in respect of the matters specified in the Schedule for the survey period covered by the survey.
That person shall give the information to the Commissioner—

subpara1.label: (a)
subpara1.lp.txt: by completing such schedule as the Commissioner may issue for that purpose; and

subpara1.label: (b)
subpara1.lp.txt: within such period as the Commissioner may specify in that schedule.

rul.title: Persons required to give information
rul.lp.txt: The person required to give information under section 4 is—

subpara1.label: (a)
subpara1.lp.txt: in the case of the business undertaking being a body corporate, a director, secretary or other person concerned in the management of the body corporate;

subpara1.label: (b)
subpara1.lp.txt: in the case of the business undertaking being a partnership, any partner of the partnership;

subpara1.label: (c)
subpara1.lp.txt: in any other case, the proprietor of the business undertaking.

rul.title: Survey period
rul.lp.txt: For the purposes of this Order, the survey periods are—

subpara1.label: (a)
subpara1.lp.txt: for collecting information in relation to wages, March, June, September and December each year beginning from 2000;

subpara1.label: (b)
subpara1.lp.txt: for collecting information in relation to payroll, each period of 3 consecutive months beginning from the first 3 months of 2000.

rul.title: Sampling methods may be used
rul.lp.txt: The Commissioner may use sampling methods to collect information for the purpose of a survey.

rul.title: Application of Order in certain cases
rul.lp.txt: This Order applies to a business undertaking for the purpose of a survey notwithstanding that it commenced business or ceased to carry on business during the survey period covered by the survey.

rul.title: Date for destruction of completed schedules
rul.lp.txt: The Commissioner shall destroy all completed schedules collected or received for a survey and all copies of the schedules not later than 24 months after the end of the survey period covered by that survey.

schedule.label: SCHEDULE
schedule.title: MATTERS IN RESPECT OF WHICHINFORMATION IS TO BE GIVEN

clause.lp.txt: Name and address of the business undertaking.
Number of persons engaged and payroll outlays.
Reasons for significant changes in the number of persons engaged and payroll outlays.
Number of standard working days per month and number of normal working hours per working day.
Number of employees, by selected occupation and by sex.
Wage information of selected occupations, by sex and by wage component.
Number of employees entitled to any fringe benefit.
